title: Thresh's Lantern Bug...?
body:
I'm a Thresh main and one of the troubles with trying to help my ADCs escape is they can't click on the lantern when they're not even silenced.

Rito pls.

replies.body: I usually spam left click and right click on the lantern. because sometimes right click doesn't work. it gets really annoying when the lantern is on enemy minions too.

> [{quoted}](name=Lauricella3,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=jW0rAhZ7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-20T00:00:48.964+0000)
>
> I usually spam left click and right click on the lantern. because sometimes right click doesn't work. **it gets really annoying when the lantern is on enemy minions too.**

This. So much.
I've had times where I've died because I end up auto attacking minions instead of grabbing the lantern, regardless of how many times I spam my clicks to get to it.

some people are just %%%%%%ed....and they dont click the lantern.

the one thing that REALLY pisses me off, in my games everyone has to damn near stand on the lantern to travel with it. but in pro games you can see a huge 400-500 range between the person and the lantern and they still travel with it.
EVERY single time.
if it was me in those games where < 100 HP corkis and %%%% were getting away with the lantern, 100% of the time i would have died because there is no way i would have traveled with the lantern.
and dont say its the spectator bug, because i have spectated normal games 100s of times and watched people need to stand ON the lantern before moving with it.
and dont say its pro players knowing how to use it better, because i spectate diamond master and challengers who do the EXACT same thing as in my games. even streamers who are pro players do the same thing, its ONLY and ONLY in pro and LCS games. the first time i saw it was watching OGN. its like thresh lantern gains range during pro games. possibly on LAN servers so less delay?
